Comments_List: This course is meant to help seniors write their theses in WGSS. The insights I learned from this course mostly revolved around making concrete plans to ease the writing of my senior essay after having gained tools for doing the literature review and original research in the Junior Theory and Methods seminar.
This course is very helpful for getting students who need structure on track.
